name: Textarea
description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea. Used for multi-line text input

props.name: label
props.description: The label text for the textarea

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text shown when textarea is empty

props.name: value
props.description: The controlled value of the textarea

props.name: onChange
props.description: Called when the textarea value changes

props.name: rows
props.description: The number of visible text lines

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below the textarea

author: UI Components Team
